channel.title: The Deck Investigates on SWIEST - Transcripts · Screenplays · Lyrics
channel.description: Recent content in The Deck Investigates on SWIEST - Transcripts · Screenplays · Lyrics

item.title: 3 of 3: Our Lingering Obsession | The Deck Investigates
item.description: Podcast Description We go back to Argos to revisit a family we told you about previously, but focus on one brother in particular who was a recurring theme in our inbox after releasing The Deck Investigates. Transcript

item.title: 2 of 3: A Secret Confession | The Deck Investigates
item.description: Podcast Description A new suspect name is dropped into our inbox, with third-hand information about him having confessed to Darlene’s murder. Transcript

item.title: 1 of 3: Government Discretion | The Deck Investigates
item.description: Podcast Description Seven months after we dropped The Deck Investigates, we’re back with an update on everything we’ve learned since then. Transcript

item.title: 15 of 15: Next in the Investigation | The Deck Investigates
item.description: Podcast Description In the season one finale of Darlene Hulse’s case, we lay out next steps for officials, fill you in on three other loose ends we’re continuing to work, and ask you to do your part to get justice for Darlene. Transcript

item.title: 14 of 15: A Massive Revelation | The Deck Investigates
item.description: Podcast Description We consult an expert in hopes of getting answers to questions in Darlene Hulse’s autopsy report, and what he reveals turns everything we thought we knew upside down. Transcript

item.title: 13 of 15: Untangling Misinformation | The Deck Investigates
item.description: Podcast Description We discover we’ve been given bad information about a person of interest. Either we were lied to or those in charge are confusing vital information in this cold case. Transcript

item.title: 12 of 15: P.I.'s Best Lead | The Deck Investigates
item.description: Podcast Description We interview private investigator Patrick Zirpoli who reviewed the case and came up with yet another person of interest based on pre-crime, crime, and post-crime behavior. Transcript

item.title: 11 of 15: Bad Seed | The Deck Investigates
item.description: Podcast Description We sort through tips from 1984 that tell police to look at a man accused of the attempted rape and attempted murder of another Indiana woman that same year. Transcript

item.title: 10 of 15: Look at the Deeds | The Deck Investigates
item.description: Podcast Description We study land records and discover a shocking connection between where Darlene Hulse’s body was found and Kenneth McCune Jr., a man who was convicted of another crime nearby. Transcript

item.title: 9 of 15: Let's Go for a Ride | The Deck Investigates
item.description: Podcast Description We visit the crime scenes in Argos, Indiana and drive the escape route police think the killer took. Prosecutor Nelson Chipman shares his theory on what he believes happened to Darlene. Transcript

item.title: 8 of 15: It All Goes Through One Guy | The Deck Investigates
item.description: Podcast Description The audiochuck team joins Darlene Hulse’s daughters on their quest for answers. Transcript

item.title: 7 of 15: Bring in the FBI | The Deck Investigates
item.description: Podcast Description Police ask the FBI to analyze Darlene Hulse’s case and how it might connect to two others in the Argos, Indiana area. Transcript

item.title: 6 of 15: Evil All Around | The Deck Investigates
item.description: Podcast Description Police interview Darlene Hulse’s husband, Ron, to learn more about Darlene, the couple’s relationship, and their family’s routines. Transcript

item.title: 5 of 15: He's Gunned Down | The Deck Investigates
item.description: Podcast Description A surprising suspect emerges after a fatal shootout of a robber in Texas. When police are asked to search his Indiana residence, they find bloody clothes and a newspaper clipping about Darlene Hulse’s murder. Transcript

item.title: 4 of 15: They Left Town | The Deck Investigates
item.description: Podcast Description Police work their way through dozens of tips and zero in on two suspects which take detectives from Indiana to Colorado, Alabama, and back in order to interrogate the men they thought could be responsible for Darlene Hulse’s death. Transcript

item.title: 3 of 15: The Wooded Path | The Deck Investigates
item.description: Podcast Description An unsuspecting timber buyer happens upon Darlene Hulse’s body in the woods just miles from her front door. The discovery and her autopsy leave investigators with more questions than answers as to why this happened to Darlene. Transcript

item.title: 2 of 15: A Stranger's Wrath | The Deck Investigates
item.description: Podcast Description When police respond to the home of Darlene Hulse, it’s too late. Darlene and her captor are nowhere to be found. Transcript

item.title: 1 of 15: Take a Bath | The Deck Investigates
item.description: Podcast Description On the morning of August 17, 1984, Darlene Hulse was at home in rural Argos, Indiana with her three young daughters when a stranger came to the door and forced himself on her. Transcript

item.title: Darlene Hulse (4 of Hearts, Indiana) | The Deck Investigates
item.description: Podcast Description Our card this season is Darlene Hulse, the 4 of Hearts from Indiana. Transcript
